website_summaries.verdict: Despite one minor (and fixable) problem, most customers feel that this is an easy to use and high-quality option.
pros: Features cast in-angle indicators with raised bending points of reference
Made of durable but lightweight aluminum construction
cons: Consistent problems with the bubble level falling off the tool, which can be fixed with clear-drying glue
Does not come with a handle

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect tube bender.
customer_reviews.text: The casting is good. I use to roll M & L ridged copper tubing for custom lamp and chandelier projects. My only complaint is the bubble levels provided don't fit well in their snap slots. They keep falling out. Clear drying hot glue applied with a hot glue gun or clear silicone will fix. If a small disposable tube of clear adhesive with instructions were included, this handy tool would be a 5 star purchase. I also lined the tube bending valley with a thin self adhesive layer of foam insulation to keep stainless and copper tube pristine and minimize rub marring.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Cracker

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The level indicators for 45 and 90 degrees are not properly calibrated (off by several degrees) and are glued in and not adjustable. A small magnetic angle finder will suit much better. Otherwise, the bender makes nice clean bends. It is very close to an 8" radius as stated. I recommend a 5 foot handle for good mechanical advantage over the conduit (make life easier for yourself). I'd recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus_Manimal

customer_reviews.title: Sought and feature packet.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Fit in a Klein handel from my 1/2” bender. I over worked it today with some old galvanized water pipe. Worked like a champ. Mine is a Warehouse item and was a great value as well. Clear markings, thick material, nice levels. You can’t go wrong with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM H BERWANGER

customer_reviews.title: There are better options
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, it bends EMT just fine. On the downside, the bubble levels fell out immediately, which makes square bends difficult. I also couldn't see any markings to indicate where I should measure from to endure that my bends actually fit right; I had to do a lot of trial and error, instead of just measuring, subtracting 5 inches, and aligning with the marking on (apparently) nicer benders. There are almost certainly better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Casting is solid and free from bubbles and voids; no mold flashing either. There are bubble levels that are not very useful but I've never needed them for pipe conduit work before so the point it moot.
customer_reviews.author: CDub

customer_reviews.title: Like others have said
customer_reviews.text: The bender worked correctly, I used it to bend SCH 40 3/4" black pipe. The description should read 8 Inch inside bend radius instead of 8 degree. Like others have said, the level isn't correct, no where near but I always use a mag level on the pipe anyways. The add said it was used but I'm almost positive it was never used to bend pipe, It was perfect out of the box without ANY signs of scuffs, nicks or markings of ever being used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, but listed incorrectly on amazon. you wont get what you think you are getting.
customer_reviews.text: i like the product and it works well. Becareful with ordering it from Amazon. I had to order it twice, paying double to get the whole tool. The first time i only got the handle. Second time i only got the bender. both times the same sticker with the model number was on both. They needed to have Part 1 of 2 and part 2 of 2 on the stickers. If you order this you may only get a handle, or you may only get a bender. You should be getting both parts for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Tlode

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Both bubble levels fell out of the box as I opened it. If thats any indication of the quality of the shoe Im not expecting much. If you aren't to conserned with the levels, the shoe itself appears to be made okay. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.224

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick. I should've bought one with a handle. It works well simple bending of Conduit.
customer_reviews.author: Shaungabby

customer_reviews.title: If I only had the handle.
customer_reviews.text: The bender at Lowes was 33% more expensive so I found it on Amazon and I knew it didn't come with a handle. I couldn't find a suitable handle in my stash and had to buy one from Lowes which brought the price up to the Lowes price. Oh well. It was a good try.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I needed to make a few bends in some 1" conduit. I tried making a bender out of wood. It didn't work, it bent the conduit alright but it put ugly kinks in it. I got this head and a piece of water pipe for a handle at the local hardware store. Worked great. Really a solid piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: PackRat

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling and beautiful looking textured handle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of using a piece of rigid pipe because I was too lazy to get one for free; I have no regrets. This is worth the step up from a piece of pipe. Great feeling and beautiful looking textured handle; well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This says it comes with a handle but did not come with one. Beware not as shown in in write up.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product that hardly works unless you're just using it for offsets.
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum head leaves cuts on all of my bends, I have even ground down the rough edges, there are only angle marks on the head making it difficult to line up the bends that I have to make as a commercial electrician. I guess that you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: E Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great, no handle
customer_reviews.text: Worked great not sure why no handle, I cannot imagine someone ordering this saying; 'oh, I won't need a handle.' I'm not sure if all handles are the same diameter, if so that would explain it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Does What Its Suppose To Do
customer_reviews.text: Does not flex while bending 3/4" thin wall conduit which helps with accurate bends.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified
customer_reviews.text: My old bender was a Greenlee set (3/4 and 1/2) I purchased several years ago. Well, after considerable use they finally bit the radish. Purchased these, and put them to use right away. So far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AVDOC

customer_reviews.title: Great price - Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. If you don't need the handle, this is a great deal...you can save a lot of money compared to your local Lowe's, Home Depot, True Value, etc. NOTE: If you don't already have a handle, you'll need one...trying to bend conduit (well) without a handle is nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: give it a miss
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to bend pipe more than once, don't buy this. Since I used it, I won't return it. The other reviewers were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Old Surfer Dude

customer_reviews.title: good deal for the part timer
customer_reviews.text: did fine for as little as I need it it wasnt worht a expensive klein or whatever so I bought a pipe handle and its done the job Going to be buying the 3/4 here shortly
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence D

customer_reviews.title: sturdy tool, but I ordered the wrong size and ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy tool, but I ordered the wrong size and had to return it!! I'm certain I would have worn out before this tool ever would!
customer_reviews.author: Keith M. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: A very good product for the price. Buy threaded iron pipe as a handle from local home store. Cheap and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Family Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Star mark would be nice
customer_reviews.text: No star or other reference marks, although it does have angle marks. Works fine for 1" EMT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks okay
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made. Functions as it should. I held off on a higher rating until it proves itself in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Renting one for the weekend ...
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Renting one for the weekend would have cost 3 times as much as it was to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd E Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Upon arrival, both level vials were broken. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival, both level vials were broken. It has graduated arrows for bend degrees however, so not a total loss
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Spagnolo

customer_reviews.title: Bends as described.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. You better weigh 300 lbs to use this on 1" conduit. Can get two people on it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: X Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made quick work for a quarter of of the price of the comparable local product.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: losing bubble
customer_reviews.text: Nice works good but the level bubble fell off first time using it.
customer_reviews.author: heriberto camacho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It bends conduit just like it should.....what else can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good, but I haven't used it yet
customer_reviews.author: George Gill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not come with pole as ordered so is completely useless
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM M BARNES

customer_reviews.title: woks with effort
customer_reviews.text: I used a 4 foot long pipe for the handle. Bending 1" emt is not as easy as 1/2" emt. The shoe on this bender is not quite as deep as some others I have seen. If you don't weigh about 170+ to put enough pressure to keep the emt in the shoe, you will end up with kinks. I bought this for a one time project and don't plan on using it very often so it is O.K. for the money. If I was going to use it a lot, I would probably get one with a deeper shoe and a larger foot rest.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Okay for home gamer, but not for pro use.
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, but unconventional design compared to industry standard Bendfield or Greenlee. The angle of the handle is odd and with little to almost no foot pad it is difficult to bend 1 inch pipe even though I weigh about 220 Lbs. There is no star marking for bending in the reverse direction and I got poor results trying to bend overhand style where the bender head is in the air and the pipe is pulled down. Okay for the price and if you only need to make a few bends, but wouldn't recommend it for a commercial situation or if you need to do hundreds of bends.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a steel handle that supports a tube bending tool...what else can you say ? It works.
customer_reviews.author: Bissell J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: so everybody gets high marks if the product was good and arrived on time (Or even a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: I always wait until I have a mountain sized pile of things I have not reviewed, so everybody gets high marks if the product was good and arrived on time (Or even a few days late.) This should be considered high praise, even if this same message is posted to 50 or so products.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard J.

product_meta.title: Aluminum Die Cast Conduit Bender, 6 Degree Inside Radius, for 3/4" EMT or 1/2" Rigid
product_meta.description: Style:Aluminum Die Cast| Size:For 3/4" EMT or 1/2" RigidAluminum die cast conduit bender. For 3/4" EMT or 1/2" Rigid, 6 Degree Inside Radius
feature_bullets: Conduit bender have cast in-angle indicators with raised bending points of reference to aid the installer
The bodies are aluminum die cast which are lightweight yet strong enough for everyday use
Conduit bender is for 3/4-inches Electrical Metallic Tubing (EMT) or 1/2-inches rigid

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
